solution_line_template: First find the number of pups in the first generation: {initial_mice} mice * {pups_per_mouse_first_gen} pups/mouse = <<{initial_mice}*{pups_per_mouse_first_gen}={first_gen_pups}>>{first_gen_pups} pups

Then add the number of adult mice to find the total number of mice: {first_gen_pups} pups + {initial_mice} mice = <<{first_gen_pups}+{initial_mice}={total_mice_after_first_gen}>>{total_mice_after_first_gen} mice

Then find the number of pups per mouse that survive from the second generation: {pups_per_mouse_second_gen_initial} pups/mouse - {pups_eaten_per_mouse} pups/mouse = <<{pups_per_mouse_second_gen_initial}-{pups_eaten_per_mouse}={surviving_pups_per_mouse_second_gen}>>{surviving_pups_per_mouse_second_gen} pups/mouse

Then multiply that number by the number of adult mice to find the number of pups in the second generation: {total_mice_after_first_gen} mice * {surviving_pups_per_mouse_second_gen} pups/mouse = <<{total_mice_after_first_gen}*{surviving_pups_per_mouse_second_gen}={second_gen_pups}>>{second_gen_pups} mice

Then add the number of adult mice to the number of second-generation pups to find the total number of mice: {second_gen_pups} mice + {total_mice_after_first_gen} mice = <<{second_gen_pups}+{total_mice_after_first_gen}={final_total_mice}>>{final_total_mice} mice
